NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PLUME: Look at these marvels.. Friends, we have discovered a new species of lifeforms native to this star system!
2 1
MELORAE: I've never seen lifeforms such as these before! They look mesmerizing, dancing along the ocean's surface..
3 2
THATCH: An update: keep your distance, my friends, for these species generate a terrifying voltage of bioelectricity! I was slightly zapped as I waded past it!
4 3
THATCH: How exhilarating! I cannot imagine what new species of life we may discover as we explore the rest of this star system!
Pioneer EX4 2
